frame.name: Being_located
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Theme</fen> is in a stable position with respect to a <fen>Location</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Theme">Our offices</fex> are <t>located</t> <fex name="Location">about two miles south of I-85</fex> .</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Theme
FE.definition: <def-root>An entity which is at a particular Location</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location (generally presumed to be known to the interlocutor) with respect to which the location of the <fen>Theme</fen> can be understood.</def-root>

FE.name: Dependent_state
FE.definition:
<def-root>A state (of the <fen>Theme</fen>) that results as a consequence of the <fen>Theme</fen> being situated at the <fen>Location</fen>.
<ex>The inn was <fex name="Dep">well</fex> <t>situated</t> <fex name="Dep">to take advantage of the visiting tourists</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time at which the <fen>Theme</fen> is at the <fen>Location</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Location
FE.definition: <def-root>A salient entity that the <fen>Theme</fen> is located with respect to.</def-root>

FE.name: Cotheme
FE.definition: <def-root>This frame element is used to denote phrases that specifically entail an entity which is conceived as moving relative to another entity.</def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition:
<def-root>A Depictive expression describes a state or condition of the <fen>Theme</fen> independent of its location.
<ex>The rubble of the buildings <t>lies</t> <fex name="Depictive">in a heap</fex> just outside the city.</ex></def-root>
